page.title: 05Hills and me
page.content: Dartmoor is a vast area of moorland covered in hills,or it seems like that especially around the area of Widgery Cross.The hills around this area would probably deter any sane person from setting a foot outside his/her car. Spending a day "killing" yourself climbing up one of these generously built hills would be worthy of getting you a place in a mental home,but when you get to the top and look at the view you get a sense of pure exhilaration.Then you can collapse.People who come to this place and just sit in their cars are a prime example of GROCKLES.They should get out and climb a hill.So what if they die when they get to the top,at least they have deserved a nice place to die.Most people do go and walk miles for fun.this shows how mad people are in 1985.
